Articles.Content:
Hi,

I was attempting to play Kerbal today, only to be given an unplayable framerate. After some hours of troubleshooting, I noticed that when I launched the game, my RAM usage only increases by a few percent, with my CPU being used a ton. I am running the 64bit version, and I have no idea why the game is doing this. Help!

I don't think an output_log is needed, considering when I looked in there, I saw nothing out of the ordinary.
This is unmodded support, the 64bit version is only officially supported on Linux. 64bit Windows won't get any support at all.
I will head to the modded installs, thanks
